CustomField.description: PFG Active Funds for Investor Profile
CustomField.formula: or(text( Status__c )="Marketing",text( Status__c )="Discontinued", text( Status__c )="Closed", text( Status__c )="Fully Divested")&& or(text( Vehicle_Type__c )="Private Fund",text( Vehicle_Type__c )="Private Fund - Open Ended", text( Vehicle_Type__c )="Separate Accounts",text( Vehicle_Type__c )="Co-Invest",text( Vehicle_Type__c )="Joint Venture")&& RecordType.Name ="Fund Internal" && Total_Raised_Capital__c >0
CustomField.inlineHelpText: PFG Active Funds for Investor Profile
CustomField.label: PFG Investment Vehicle Active
